content.raw:
I have trouble building this on my machine. I get the following:
~~~
[  9%] Performing configure step for 'sandia_hand_teleop'
[rosbuild] Building package sandia_hand_teleop
CMake Error at /opt/ros/fuerte/share/ros/core/rosbuild/private.cmake:99 (message):
  [rosbuild] rospack found package "sandia_hand_teleop" at "", but the
  current directory is
  "/home/scpeters/osrf/sandia-hand/ros/sandia_hand_teleop".  You should
  double-check your ROS_PACKAGE_PATH to ensure that packages are found in the
  correct precedence order.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /opt/ros/fuerte/share/ros/core/rosbuild/public.cmake:177 (_rosbuild_check_package_location)
  CMakeLists.txt:3 (rosbuild_init)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
make[2]: *** [ros/sandia_hand_teleop/src/sandia_hand_teleop-stamp/sandia_hand_teleop-configure] Error 1
make[1]: *** [ros/CMakeFiles/sandia_hand_teleop.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
~~~
All I have in my ROS_PACKAGE_PATH is what I get from sourcing /opt/ros/fuerte/setup.bash
~~~
ROS_PACKAGE_PATH=/opt/ros/fuerte/share:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks
~~~
content.html:
I have trouble building this on my machine. I get the following:

[  9%] Performing configure step for 'sandia_hand_teleop'
[rosbuild] Building package sandia_hand_teleop
CMake Error at /opt/ros/fuerte/share/ros/core/rosbuild/private.cmake:99 (message):
  [rosbuild] rospack found package "sandia_hand_teleop" at "", but the
  current directory is
  "/home/scpeters/osrf/sandia-hand/ros/sandia_hand_teleop".  You should
  double-check your ROS_PACKAGE_PATH to ensure that packages are found in the
  correct precedence order.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /opt/ros/fuerte/share/ros/core/rosbuild/public.cmake:177 (_rosbuild_check_package_location)
  CMakeLists.txt:3 (rosbuild_init)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
make[2]: *** [ros/sandia_hand_teleop/src/sandia_hand_teleop-stamp/sandia_hand_teleop-configure] Error 1
make[1]: *** [ros/CMakeFiles/sandia_hand_teleop.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

All I have in my ROS_PACKAGE_PATH is what I get from sourcing /opt/ros/fuerte/setup.bash

ROS_PACKAGE_PATH=/opt/ros/fuerte/share:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks
